wikipedia_page.main: Stephen Deas, born in 1968 in Southeast England, is an English fantasy author. He is most famous for his fantasy opus, the Memory of Flames sequence, set in a fantasy world inhabited by dragons.

response: * Stephen Deas, Memory of Flames series (2009–2011): centered around a world inhabited by dragons, which are ridden by knights. Plot centers around their re-awakening consciousness.
** Nominated: Stephen Deas for The Adamantine Palace
Gavin Deas is the pen name for the collaborative works of authors Gavin Smith and Stephen Deas.
